SELECT b_sys_user.user_id AS "id", b_sys_user.name AS "name", b_sys_user.`phone_number` AS "phoneNumber", b_sys_user.`id_card` AS "idCard", b_sys_user.`dept_id` AS "deptId", b_xinyan_data.data_type AS "dataType", GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b_xinyan_data.type ORDER BY b_xinyan_data.type ASC) AS "type", GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b_xinyan_data.type_text ORDER BY b_xinyan_data.type_text ASC) AS "typeText", b_xinyan_data.create_time AS "createTime" FROM b_sys_user, b_xinyan_data WHERE b_sys_user.status != 'DELETED' AND b_xinyan_data.user_id = b_sys_user.user_id
and (b_sys_user.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or b_sys_user.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and (b_sys_user.dept_id = #{deptId} or b_sys_user.dept_id in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))
and (b_xinyan_data.create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
GROUP BY b_sys_user.`user_id` ORDER BY b_xinyan_data.create_time DESC
